name: Helix Rocket Kernel Patches
description: This file contains config info used to apply patches to the Intel Zephyr git repository. The patches covert the Zephyr repository into a Rocket Kernel repository.

rocket-0.9.note: Intel Zephyr v0.9 to WR Rocket v0.9

rocket-1.0.note: Intel Zephyr v1.0 to WR Rocket v1.0
